title: 4 man groups should not choose when we surrender.
body: It should require the vote of the 1 player not in their group.

replies.body:
Yeah they should. There's 5 people on a team, if four people vote surrender then thats majority rules.

Imagine being so mindlessly arrogant that you think your vote should be equal to 4 others.

And that makes sense because.....?

(hint: it does not make sense for one person to control a five-person surrender vote on their own)
seeing this cant be a ranked game either who cares.
